TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4165=08/04/2014, 6847=What was once an iconic symbol of Pittsburgh has become an old, rusty hulk and has sparked a battle between the city and the sign’s owner, Lamar Advertising., 6673=05/27/2015, 5795=05/20/2015, 1593=05/26/2011, 3365=NewsRadio 1020 KDKA–07/31/2014, 5009=09/18/2014, 2486=06/15/2012}

textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 05/26/2011 The City of Pittsburgh is about to lift its moratorium on electronic billboards, but next week the city’s planning commission is expected to pass a new ordinance that would severely restrict their use. Electronic Billboard Debate In Pittsburgh Resurfaces 06/15/2012 It’s illuminated the night sky for 75 years – most recently the beacon of the Bayer Corporation, but by day it’s deteriorating to the alarm of hilltop residents. Bayer Wants To Upgrade Mt. Washington Sign, Faces Opposition NewsRadio 1020 KDKA–07/31/2014 It looks like it is going to be lights out the an iconic Mt. Washington sign. Hear about the efforts to save it. Iconic Bayer Sign On Mt. Washington To Go Dark
